name: Piglet's Big Game
storyline: Today is a very special day! You're invited to the Hundred-Acre Wood "Very Large Soup Party!" Rabbit has to make the Very Large Soup, and it's a Very Large Job. Explore the Hundred Acre Wood, solve brain-teasing puzzles and collect all the soup ingredients from Owl, Eeyore, Tigger and Pooh. It's up to you to see that Piglet finds all of the ingredients to make this the very best "Very Large Soup Party" ever!
summary: Point-and-click adventure game loosely based off the 2003 film Piglet's Big Movie, where the main objective is for Piglet to collect all the ingredients for a soup in the Hundred-Acre Wood's annual Very Large Soup Party.
